name: Wilence's Quest
description:
You play as Wilence, he is the representation of your subconcious during your day.

During the day, you will encouter some events that will triggre negative feelings on you.

You must fight your emotions during these situations, so you dont end up with violent actions on each of them.

Depending on your performance on each event; will define your actions in the real world.

Credits:

  • Eson97 - Developer
  • Ryder - Art
  • Tutsi - Music

Known Issues:

  • The web version doesn't work as expected, so please if you want to give it a try, download the windows version, meanwhile, we where trying to fix it :)
  • Some events doesn't display as expected on the newspaper.
